name: Natural Language Query Interface
body:
## Welcome

Hi my name is Prateek. Natural Language Query Interface is a Google Summer of Code 2016 project under [vitrivr.org](https://vitrivr.org/).

## Description

In this project, I have extended the [vitrivr](https://github.com/dbisUnibas/vitrivr-ui) user interface to support voice queries by converting speech query input to text and thus build a natural language query interface that gives full control to the user to interact with the user interface by speaking voice commands in a complete natural way. 

## Main features

* Flexible voice commands

* Natural interaction using follow-up voice commands

* Spoken feedback by system for natural interaction

* Speech and mouse interaction

## Short demo video of my work

vitrivr is an innovative video retrieval engine that offers a rich set of different query paradigms to search video sequences in large video collections. This video shows the natural interaction of a user with the UI of the system using natural language query interface.

## Work done

* [Link to the commits made during GSoC period](https://github.com/prateek1985/vitrivr-ui/commits/master)

* [Link to the list of functions added in the interface for natural interaction](https://github.com/prateek1985/vitrivr-ui#list-of-functions-which-voice-commands-can-do-in-interface)

## Other Links

* [Project's github repository](https://github.com/prateek1985/vitrivr-ui)

* [GSoC Project](https://summerofcode.withgoogle.com/projects/#5587149046939648)
